title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Effective Teaching Method Design Through Comparison of Teacher Training Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and experience in operating teacher training programs
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze differences in preferences for teacher training programs based on learners' cultural backgrounds
Design tools to measure the effectiveness of teacher training programs by applying standards-based evaluation (InTASC)
Implement various instructional methodology scenarios in simulation/VR environments and derive optimal solutions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
